entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
